mil7.4.2:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘apassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.2:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kuhanalapananemittakanippesikatam apanetva susanthitamakampitamalulitasabhavaparisuddhacarena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.2:1.4: Idam, maharaja, apassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.2:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbasattesu khantimettanuddayasampannena hitesina anukampakena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.2:2.3: Idam, maharaja, apassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.2:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, apo asucim sucim karoti;
mil7.4.2:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena game va aranne va upajjhaye upajjhayamattesu acariye acariyamattesu sabbattha anadhikaranena bhavitabbam anavasesakarina.
mil7.4.2:3.3: Idam, maharaja, apassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.2:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena appicchasantutthapavivittapatisallanena satatam sabbalokamabhipatthitena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.2:4.3: Idam, maharaja, apassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.2:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, apo na kassaci ahitamupadahati;
mil7.4.2:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena parabhandanakalahaviggahavivadarittajjhanaaratijananam kayavacicittehi papakam na karaniyam.
mil7.4.2:5.3: Idam, maharaja, apassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
